attributes.title: github_repositories_help
attributes.visState: {"title":"github_repositories_help","type":"markdown","params":{"fontSize":12,"markdown":"This panel shows the **evolution of some popularity metrics** in GitHub repositories.\n\nThese metrics are the number of **forks**, **stars** and **subscribers** of each repository. Charts show their growth and variation from one period to another. By default, time frames are set to **1 month**."},"aggs":[]}
